boat.name: Vivette
boat.short_description: Centreboard gaff ketch, built Pin Mill by H. King & Sons in 1936, designed by Fred Shepherd, MINA.

for_sales.sales_text:
Centreboard gaff ketch 35’ 6" x 10’ 4", draft 4’0" – 6’0". Designed by Fred Shepherd MINA, built by H.King and Sons, Pin Mill in 1936. Registered at Lloyds no. 165040. All my family have learnt to sail in this lovely, cosy, classic yacht over the past 40 years. Lying Lochaline, Argyll, Scotland, with mooring included if required. 4-6 berth, £45k spent on major work over the past 5 years. Beautiful saloon, and lovely details.

Raymarine charts, radar, depth, VHF, gas detector, Vetus M415 engine, etc.

Reluctantly for sale, and since I want her to go to a good home the price is negotiable for the right person and to complete work required. We have an excellent competitively priced shipwright nearby who has maintained her for the past few years and can continue work ashore this winter.
